Tomorrow is the day!! The #1 reason I love #CityHallSelfie day is the inspiration. #localgov is full of peaks and valleys. Its important to remember why we chose this career and there is no better way then being inspired by thousands of fellow #localgov employees on one day! pic.twitter.com/sT9IILX1iE

— Josh Edwards (@Josh_Edwards11) August 14, 2022

Tomorrow is the day!! The #1 reason I love #CityHallSelfie day is the inspiration. #localgov is full of peaks and valleys. Its important to remember why we chose this career and there is no better way then being inspired by thousands of fellow #localgov employees on one day! pic.twitter.com/sT9IILX1iE

— Josh Edwards (@Josh_Edwards11) August 14, 2022

City Hall Selfie Day, tomorrow, Mon, Aug 15, is an opportunity for residents to take a selfie in front of a municipal building or with staff, and then post it with the hashtags #CityStAugSelfie, #CityStAug, and #CityHallSelfie, and tag @FlCities, @ELGLNetwork, and @CityStAug pic.twitter.com/5Qf14C6ZO5

— City of St. Augustine (@CityStAug) August 14, 2022

On August 15, we'll be participating in City Hall Selfie Day! To participate, hop in front of your #localgov building, snap a picture, and use the hashtag #CityHallSelfie to share it with the world! @ELGL50

— Morrisville, NC (@Morrisville_NC) August 13, 2022

@CityHallSelfie is just a few days away! Had to stop to celebrate 20 years of Duck Nc! pic.twitter.com/mmEsxGpHqy

— Jon Stehle (@JonStehle) August 13, 2022

Getting prepped and into the #CityHallSelfie spirit by looking back on the original selfie king, #KC‚Äôs own L.P. Cookingham, and the first time I met @ELGL50 in person back in 2015. pic.twitter.com/1EzbZIpHDC

— Mike Ekey (@Mike_Ekey) August 13, 2022

It‚Äôs here! @ELGL50 #CityHallSelfie (Villages too!) day is Monday, Aug. 15. @cityofappleton is in! üì∏What are your plans?

August 15 is City Hall Selfie Day ‚Äì a worldwide celebration of local government pride! The City of Puyallup staff will be participating and you can too! On Aug 15, take a selfie in front of City Hall, tag us, and post it to social media using #CityHallSelfie pic.twitter.com/sKiAsMLDXL

In past years, I would participate in #CityHallSelfie Day. One year, I ran social for a city and went out with a team to get a ton of photos. It was fun, but it can really wear you out. So I‚Äôm stepping aside this year and not participating. For those who do it, have fun.
